texts: After over 30 years at 55 Broadway we are moving. From Monday 27 January we will be based on the 4th floor at 200 Buckingham Palace Road.
If you are writing to us, please sendÂ to our new address:

TfL Pension Fund
4th Floor
200 Buckingham Palace Road
London
SW1W 9TJ
We will be updating the forms on our website, but if you have an old form you can still use it, just remember to post it to our new address.
If you are looking to visit the Pension Fund office, please call us to book an appointment in advance so that we can agree a time when a member of the team will be available to help you.
Please note that the office will be closed on 23 and 24 January while we relocate to Buckingham Palace Road.
